title: The Bitnami Open Source Application Catalog Turns 18!
author: Beltran Rueda Borrego
description: Learn how Bitnami has evolved from installers and virtual machines to support app management on clouds, containers and Kubernetes.
cntitle: Bitnami 开源应用目录迎来 18 周年！
cndescription: 了解 Bitnami 如何从安装程序和虚拟机发展到支持云、容器和 Kubernetes 上的应用程序管理。
